thread.section_title: UpRight Law Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of UpRight Law | www.uprightlaw.com | 4 of 36
thread.title: Jamie Gardner
thread.title_full: UpRight Law reviewed by Jamie Gardner

author: Jamie Gardner
title: Jamie Gardner
text: My experience was amazing. My attorney was extremely helpful and was very prompt on answering any questions I had and filed my bankruptcy and stopped my wage garnishment immediately. I would recommend anyone wanting or thinking of filing bankruptcy to call upright law firm. Most amazing service..
